did.unittitle: Tremont Despatch and United States Mail Coach waybills, 1839-1841.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Waybills from Boston and Lowell to Brattleborough and Keene; from Boston to Lexington, Concord, and Harvard; and from Brattleborough and Keene to Lowell and Boston, 1839-1841.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Waybills from Boston and Lowell to Brattleborough and Keene; from Boston to Lexington, Concord, and Harvard; and from Brattleborough and Keene to Lowell and Boston, 1839-1841.
